ie.gmit.sw

Class Consumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.Consumer

  • public class Consumer
extends java.lang.Object
    Consumer threads that are responsible for taking results from the Blocking Queue and incrementing a Synchronised counter
    Author:
    william

      This consumer method takes each result off the queue

        cypherText - The actual encrypted plainText values

    • Method Detail

      • increment

        public void increment()
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method that increments each count completed by each thread. It uses synchronized object locks to ensure that correct values are calculated during the process. When the counter reachs the maximum number of the queue, a poison onject is inserted into the queue to gracefully stop it
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        This method gracefully stops the Program

      • consume

        public void consume()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        This consumer method takes each result off the queue
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
